ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Quest spells and other items
ygData.msgSnippet: Iksar illusion spell too. Naeeldar ... From: Daniel Devorkin  To: eqenchanters@egroups.com  Date: Wednesday, May 31,
ygData.messageBody:
Iksar illusion spell too.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin <devo@...>
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 10:45 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Quest spells and other items


>The only Quest spell I know of so far is the Level 44 Tashina line spell.
>It starts in Temple of Ro and requires that you travel to 10 cities and
>retrieve the "Coin of Tash" from each of these cities. The quest goes on a
>bit after that too.
>
>-Aeramus
>48 Enchanter [Bristlebane]
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Jeremy Caswell" <moghedan@...>
>To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 7:01 AM
>Subject: [eqenchanters] Quest spells and other items
>
>
>> Unfortunately, there are no quests for spells for an enchanter, at least
>> until the high, high levels. I wish there had been a quest like the
>cleric
>> one, but, hey, that is the breaks...
>>
>> Everyone, Naeeldar is a respected and common poster on the Necro
boards...
>> he is 40th something level last I checked, so he knows the basics of
being
>> an Int caster extremely well. He also has a vast store of knowledge in
>> general EQ, and is an excellent person to ask questions.
>>
>> The Tome of Endless Enchantments will handle all of your research
needs...
>> The Book of Ancient Restoration was left over from Beta, but has no real
>> function that has been identified as of yet.
>>
>> Moghedan Carns, Enchanter of Freeport
>> Sonsi Leafcrafter, Druid of Kelethin
>> Brell Server
